sentences.sContent: If there are any notable inconsistencies or discrepancies, think through how you are going to explain the situation.
sentences.sContent_eng: If there are any notable inconsistencies or discrepancies, think through how you are going to explain the situation.
sentences.sCn: 如果有任何显著的不相符或让人起疑的情况，要想好该如何去解释这个情况。

synos.tran: 值得注意的，显著的；著名的

remMethod.val: not(知道) + able(可…的) → 可知道的 → 值得注意的

words.tran: 著名的；显著的；附有乐谱的
笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子
注意；记下（note的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: important, interesting, excellent, or unusual enough to be noticed or mentioned
